short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension for HID credential management solution.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The browser extension enables a credential management system to connect with a device (such as a smart card or USB key) via the browser. It provides the capability to provision credentials such as digital certificates into these devices, and to perform updates to the devices after the initial provisioning. 

This extension is compatible with WorkforceID Digital Credential Manager and with other applications based on HIDâ€™s credential management solution.

If you use the ActivID Credential Management System, please use this extension instead: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/activid-cms-extension/ddfoinleihmgpkhfmemkncgffilfahnm.
